articles.author: Adam Wren
articles.title: Indiana GOP rejects Trump’s map in major blow to his gerrymandering push - Politico
articles.description: The GOP-controlled state Senate voted down a bill that would have wiped out Indiana’s two Democratic-held seats in the House.
articles.content:
The members held out in spite of pipe bomb threats, unsolicited pizza deliveries to their homes, and swattings
 of their homes.
Its a major setback for the president as well and a blow to his party… [+2187 chars]
